content: Investments Online Brokerages Asked by Jeremy TanAsked on 16 Apr 2019Which bank brokerage account to choose?I am wanting to open a brokerage account with one of the banks. Would any of you guys be able to share experiences on which is the better account to start with? Currently have a CDP account linked with OCBC for monthly SSB investment.
